languages.text: Война давно покинула планету, оставив после себя саван из ядовитых веществ, стремительно убивающий все живое. Мир войны необратимо преобразился в мертвый мир.

traits.locale_text: Война давно покинула планету, оставив после себя саван из ядовитых веществ, стремительно убивающий все живое. Мир войны необратимо превоплотился в мертвый мир.

languages.text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.
languages.original_text: Война давно покинула планету, оставив после себя саван из ядовитых веществ, стремительно убивающий все живое. Мир войны необратимо преобразился в мертвый мир.

traits.locale_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

languages.text: 这颗行星上的战争很久以前就结束了，但带有剧毒的物质笼罩住了那颗行星，所有生物都很快灭绝了。这个一度饱受战争摧残的世界，如今已经变成了死寂世界，无药可救。
languages.original_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星上的战争很久以前就结束了，但带有剧毒的物质笼罩住了那颗行星，所有生物都很快灭绝了。这个一度饱受战争摧残的世界，如今已经变成了死寂世界，无药可救。

languages.text: 戦争ははるか昔に惑星から去り、その後に有毒物質の覆いが残され、あらゆる生物が急速に死滅している。戦争で荒廃した惑星は、取り返しのつかない死滅惑星へと変わってしまった。
languages.original_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

traits.locale_text: 戦争ははるか昔に惑星から去り、その後に有毒物質の覆いが残され、あらゆる生物が急速に死滅している。戦争で荒廃した惑星は、取り返しのつかない死滅惑星へと変わってしまった。

languages.text: La guerra abandonó este mundo hace mucho, dejando solo una mortaja tóxica que mata rápidamente a cualquier ser vivo. El mundo, arrasado por la guerra, es ahora un mundo muerto sin recuperación posible.
languages.original_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

traits.locale_text: La guerra abandonó este mundo hace mucho, dejando solo una mortaja tóxica que mata rápidamente a cualquier ser vivo. El mundo, arrasado por la guerra, es ahora un mundo muerto sin recuperación posible.

languages.text: Als der Krieg auf dem Planeten vor langer Zeit endete, hinterließ er eine Wolke aus giftigen Substanzen, die jedes lebende Wesen in kürzester Zeit töten. Der vom Krieg gezeichnete Planet wurde unwiederbringlich in eine tote Welt verwandelt.
languages.original_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

traits.locale_text: Als der Krieg auf dem Planeten vor langer Zeit endete, hinterließ er eine Wolke aus giftigen Substanzen, die jedes lebende Wesen in kürzester Zeit töten. Der vom Krieg gezeichnete Planet wurde unwiederbringlich in eine tote Welt verwandelt.

languages.text: La guerre a ravagé la planète il y a longtemps, laissant dans son sillage un nuage de substances toxiques qui tue rapidement n'importe quel être vivant. Ce monde déchiré par la guerre s'est transformé à jamais en un monde mort.
languages.original_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

traits.locale_text: La guerre a ravagé la planète il y a longtemps, laissant dans son sillage un nuage de substances toxiques qui tue rapidement n'importe quel être vivant. Ce monde déchiré par la guerre s'est transformé à jamais en un monde mort.

languages.text: Gezegende uzun zaman önce yaşanan savaştan geriye zehirli maddelerden oluşan ve yaşayan her şeyi hızla öldüren tabakalar kalmış. Savaşla paramparça olan gezegen, geri döndürülemez bir şekilde bir ölü dünyaya dönüşmüş.
languages.original_text: War departed the planet long ago, leaving in its wake a shroud of poisonous substances that are rapidly killing every living thing. The war-torn world has been irrevocably transformed into a dead world.

traits.locale_text: Gezegende uzun zaman önce yaşanan savaşın ardından, geriye zehirli maddelerden oluşan ve yaşayan her şeyi hızla öldüren tabakalar kalmış. Savaşla paramparça olan dünya, geri döndürülemez bir şekilde bir ölü dünyaya dönüşmüş.
